text: 5.9: Ro 1.18; 2.5; 2.8; 3.25; 1 Te 1.10; Hi 9.14; 1 Zo 1.7Krais rimgim, ana vɨzɨn sia suav, nza muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana nta ruagim, Fhe Bakɨme ntigem tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir nzan kaai. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza ntigem guigira kaŋgi. Ana khaŋ tɨgɨp guigira nzan kurkurarga. Fhe Bakɨme mba tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuav guigira ndav shirga tuk hɨrga. Ana muumbara mbatɨgar mben muunga. Nza mba tugen, nza Krais muuŋgi ŋaarar panan, nza guigi guarara nzerara kɨrga.
